We are changing how people shop.

If you write awesome code - we should talk.

Come help us build killer products. We are a small, agile team based in SF, that is looking to add a few more quality developers. If that sounds compelling - check out our culture, our team, and then drop us a line.

Culture

  • Coding
  • Thinking
  • Coffeeing
  • Playing
  • Drinking
  • Dataing

We get stuff done. We have fun. We test. We learn. We work well together. We drink beer and sip nice whiskey. We're big thinkers. We care about the product we are building.

Come Join Us

We are looking for people who...

  • Like solving complex problems in elegant, scalable ways
  • Are comfortable anywhere in the rails stack
  • Love writing great code and taking time to design and plan
  • Possess great communication skills with both technical and non-technical folks
  • Enjoy owning the vision for a product (we don't have product managers here).
  • Are obsessed with data
Apply via Email

Open Positions

Full Stack Engineer (Rails Experience Welcome) / SF
Drop us a line
Data Analytics Engineer

Stitch Fix, Inc. – San Francisco, CA Responsibilities: Design and develop software products for the overall company platform. Specific duties include: building customer and employee facing web products and analytics to track the operations and finances of the business; providing algorithmic recommendations for customer purchases; building features and functionality in a traditional web product technology stack (relational database, web application, and user facing UI) using Postgres RDBMS, Django web application server, and standards-based HTML, CSS, and Javascript; providing inventory management (new inventory, returning inventory, and pick/pack/ship); and designing and engineering reports based on company analytics and delivering them in a usable format to the management team.

Education: Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Technology or related field, or the equivalent.

Experience: Three (3) years of experience in the job offered or similar software engineering position.

Other Requirements: Professional experience must include experience with: building web products; relational databases, web application servers, and web browser technologies; and analytics and recommendation technologies.

Contact: Katrina Lake, CEO klake@stitchfix.com
